text: Zhou Lingmei (born 28 March 1968) is a Chinese former cyclist. She competed in the women's individual pursuit at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of China Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China
title: Zhou Lingmei
